Class.name: Telegram.Bot.ForwardMessage
Class.Description: Use this method to forward messages of any kind. On success, the sent Message is returned.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: set .."chat_id" = chatId set .."from_chat_id" = fromChatId set .."disable_notification" = $Get(disableNotification) set .."message_id" = messageId return $$$OK
